DOC.brief_title: Double-blind , Placebo-Controlled Pilot Study Bupropion Promote Smoking Cessation During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , parallel group design use allow rigorous preliminary assessment feasibility , effectiveness , safety bupropion SR ( sustained release ; package Zyban GlaxoSmithKline ) promote smoke cessation among woman second third trimester pregnancy . Fifty pregnant smoker randomize receive 8-week course either bupropion SR match placebo tablet . Both group receive evidence-based smoking cessation counseling . The primary smoking outcome 7-day point prevalence abstinence cotinine validation end treatment . Secondary outcome include enrollment , retention , compliance rate ; continuous abstinence end treatment 2 week followup ; continuous abstinence birth 2nd week postpartum followup ; self-reported reduction number cigarette smoke per day ; maternal side effect perinatal/neonatal outcome . Preliminary smoking cessation safety outcome assessed generation evidence-based hypothesis regard clinical benefit bupropion pregnant smoker preparation fo large trial .
